sources.title: We Are Boats | Full Movie | Heartfelt Fantasy Drama | Angela Sarafyan | Adriana Mather
sources.description:
We Are Boats - Lives intertwine and connect when Francesca navigates through the living world by encountering strangers at the exact moment she needs to, sending their lives on either a better course towards happiness or setting the wheels in motion towards a tragic end- All while she secretly searches for a loved one that she never had the chance to say goodbye to.
2018.  Stars: Adriana Mather, Amanda Plummer, Angela Sarafyan
